DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate whether use Jawbone wristband monitor , connection home-based exercise nutritional counseling safely complete improve cardiorespiratory fitness ( heart lung health ) woman early stage endometrial cancer undergone surgery .
DOC.criteria: Ages > 18 year . Localized endometrial cancer ( stage I II ) ; evidence stage III IV disease . At least 2 month pass since hysterectomy enrollment . Karnofsky performance status > 70 % . Body mass index 30.0 49.9 body weight < 300 pound . No plan adjuvant endometrial cancer therapy . Able exercise safely treadmill . No absolute contraindication exercise test recommend American Thoracic Society . No recent ( < 6 month ) acute cardiac event unstable angina , uncontrolled dysrhythmias cause symptom hemodynamic compromise , symptomatic aortic stenosis , uncontrolled symptomatic heart failure , acute pulmonary embolus , acute myocarditis pericarditis , suspect know dissect aneurism acute systemic infection . The subject participate regular physical exercise ( 60 minute moderate intensity 30 minute vigorous intensity exercise per week ) weight reduction diet . Able provide inform consent . Have reliable transportation test facility . Subjects must able speak understand English participate study . Subjects must personal mobile device compatible activity monitor Compatible device activity monitor : Android Activity monitor compatible Android device equip Bluetooth 4.0 run Android 4.3 ( Jelly Bean ) later . iOS iPhone 4 ( new ) iPod touch ( 5th generation newer ) iPad ( 3rd generation newer ) iPad mini ( 1st generation newer ) iPad Air ( 1st generation newer )
